title: Deploy a React App to AWS
tldr: Host your website on AWS for only a few dollars a month and get hands-on experience across products such as S3, CloudFront, Route53 and Certificate Manager. AWS has been a market leader since its inception. People and businesses of all sizes and orientations, including Fortune 500 companies, are either using or adopting the AWS cloud.
